item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven and the nearby area.

This week's location is: Mikro

It is the newest bar/restaurant in the New Haven area--just opening about a week ago.

Located a short 7 miles North of New Haven, straight up Whitney Ave... or take the RT40 Connector off 91. Very near Side Street Grille & Luce if you need a landmark.

Mikro offers 18 beers on tap and huge bottle selection. Great food and wine list as well. Big beers, small plates. http://www.mikrobeerb...


Specials for NHC members

• An assortment of complimentary appetizers
• First drink "on the house" for NHC members (draft beer, house wines and well drinks)

Hope to see you all there. Host is Doug, contact number 203-305-5282.

Here is a review: http://www.yelp.com/b...

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend**

http://www.mikrobeerb...
